alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued September 21 at 12:42PM MDT until September 23 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Widespread, sub-freezing temperatures ranging from 25 to 30 degrees. * WHERE...Star Valley, Upper Green River Basin Foothills, Upper Green River Basin and South Lincoln County. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locations such as Cokeville, Bondurant, and Daniel will likely see the coldest temperatures.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
